pullrequest.title: S3: mount to a subfolder inside the configured bucket

content.html:
I've been testing some changes to keep the directory structure the same as before:

#!/osrf/cloudsim-sim/branches/compare/s3bucket-folder-per-constellation_ian%0Ddefault#diff

This is mainly so that later when writing scripts to parse logs we can safely assume the same directory structure for all runs
